name: Ski Jump VR
description: Ski Jump VR is a ski jumping game for PC, and also HTC Vive and Oculus Rift that will include at least 10 hills.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Dual Core CPU Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 660 GTX / AMD 7700  equivalent or better Storage: 1700 MB available space Additional Notes: For VR: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 (equivalent or greater)
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 8000 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 1700 MB available space Additional Notes: For VR: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 (equivalent or greater)
